review_data.title: Service and experience matters the most...
review_data.content: Cute little joint serving Indian food next to the Four Points hotel and Sihlcity mall. It took a while to decide what to eat as there are plenty of good options within this building, it has Sushi, Chinese, Thai and Indian. I decided to try...More

review_data.title: Wonderfully authentic
review_data.content: We love this place and the staff too. They are wonderfully welcoming and the variety of dishes is more than enough. We eat from here regularly. Looking forward to eating there again.

review_data.title: Indisch vom feinsten
review_data.content: Butter Chicken, Hot Beef oder wie das nochmals heisst. Einfach genial! Freundlicher Service inklusive!

review_data.title: Excellent Indian taste
review_data.content: Had Dinner couple of times in Sep 2017. Few thoughts : 1) Excellent indian food 2) Very courteous staff 3) Good seating overlooking the sihl city mall entrance.....nice to sit out during sunny days 4) good veg selection would highly recommend this place. Kindly note...More

review_data.title: Really good curry ! :-)
review_data.content: This place is located right next to the Sheraton and was a place I went to last...just wish I had gone earlier ! the curry is really good. I went at lunchtime and it was packed as its a combination of two cuisines. It does...More

review_data.title: Authenticated great taste!

review_data.title: Ok but not very authentic

review_data.title: Fast and tasty indian food for a quick lunch
review_data.content: I discovered this corner just a few weeks ago. It is just a counter selling indian food inside a big hall where you can also get chinese food or sushi on the carousel. There is basically no service and no atmosphere. You order and wait...More
